These roasted chickpeas with spices are delicious in salads, soups, in rice with veggies or as a snack!

#Ingredients

- 1 can of chickpeas

- 2 tbsp olive oil

- 1 tsp cumin

- 1 tsp paprika

- 1 tsp turmeric

- salt to taste

- pepper to taste


#Directions

- Drain the can of chickpeas and pat them dry.

- Add the seasoning and oil and combine everything together.

- Cook in the oven at high heat for about 40 min or until they have a texture you're happy with.
